text: Hotter Than Hell is the second album from the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on October 22, 1974. == Track listing == * Got To Choose * Parasite * Goin' Blind * Hotter Than Hell * Let Me Go, Rock 'N' Roll * All The Way * Watchin' You * Mainline * Comin' Home * Strange Ways ==References== Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1974 albums Category:Hard rock albums Category:Heavy metal albums
title: Hotter Than Hell
